Hi nick i am also a logo designer and i think you did something wrong there, wen you set the grey scale to the eye you should not colorize the reflection of it, you can see that the reflection in the eye you just changed the color is also colorized, the reflection should be white because the light going into the eye is reflected by the outer layer and not the pupil that makes the image appear that the ambient light shinning in her eyes are the exact color of her eyes and adding unique colors to both eyes make it even worst, feels unnatural and the observer can really identify the editing.
